business_rules: The year column represents the year in which the exam was give.
For the failed marksheets the sgpa and cgpa will be null.
The classification column will be null for the failed marksheets.
The remarks column will be having something like semester not cleared for the failed marksheets. Otherwise, it will something like semester cleared.
The stream name (as degree's name) should be used as stream name
Dont use degree id in the stream name. Use degree's name instead.
If there contains -1 in the internal_marks, practical_marks, theory_marks, total_marks, ngp, tgp then it represents 'AB' else
For the failed subject, the year2 will be null
Status would be failed or passed
If the student is failed in any subject then the entire semester will be failed
If the student is passed in all subjects then the entire semester will be passed
If the total marks obtained for the particular subject is less than 30% ((total * 100)/full_marks from subject_metadata) , then the student is failed in that subject
If the marksheet percentage ((sum of total of  all subjects * 100)/sum of full_marks from subject_metadata) is less than 30% then the student is failed in that semester
